title: Legacy File Accumulation: 8 Backup Files Cluttering Codebase
description: Low technical debt: 8 legacy backup files identified (*.original.tsx, *.refactored.ts, *.deprecated.tsx) cluttering codebase and causing confusion about active file status. Root cause: Incomplete cleanup after refactoring and development experiments. Prevention: Establish cleanup procedures after development iterations and implement .gitignore patterns for temporary files.
